resources.string: El Retiro is known as the "Cradle of Liberty" because it was there that the first release of slaves in the country was held in 1789. The architecture of traditional village that preserves El Retiro and its rich history make it a very attractive place interesting.
Go and knows the tradition of cabinetmakers working families with wood perfection; you can take to acquire various objects in this material.
It is reached by the Via Las Palmas is just 40 minutes from Medellin.

The Hotel La Antigua is located in the exclusive historic area of El Retiro. Located approximately 33 kilometers from the city of Medellin, and between this city and the municipalities of Rionegro and La Ceja. This region is architecturally the most traditional for its surroundings between town and country, with roads dual carriageway for a comfortable journey.

10 guest cabins each with private bathroom services with hot water, minibar, cable TV and personalized service to the room, with great variety of grilled meats charcoal and firewood, and a variety of spirits, athletic activities fishing, horse rental and games for children.
Kilometer 2 way la fe, El Retiro

El Cabrero is located 15 km from the center of El Retiro. El Cabrero has 16 rooms with private bathroom and free internet. El Cabrero has a fully equipped kitchen, living room and terrace with wonderful lake view. El Cabrero organizes activities like hiking in the different surroundings.
Los Salados Park , La Fe Reservoir

The center of activities is the dam of La Fe to which have been added several attractions for your entertainment. This park offers water bicycle, area restaurants, stands with grills, train, swimming, nature trails and other playground in a pleasant natural environment.
It is located on the edge of the road on the road linking Las Palmas Medellin with El Retiro.

It is an attractive crystalline water that takes its name from the similarity to the Tequendama Falls near Bogota, though much smaller. Admire its waterfall of over 20 meters high, formed by the stream Don Diego.
It is 7 kilometers from the road to La Ceja.
The structure of this temple was completed in 1774. In the inner dome protruding altar paintings of the Evangelists San Juan, San Marcos, San Lucas and San Mateo.
Ecological reserve San Sebastián La Castellana

It is a complex of seven viewpoints, from where you can see a beautiful view of the Aburrá Valley, the Valley of San Nicholas and on sunny days, some mountains of Caldas, the Nevado del Ruiz and stone Guatapé.Cuenta with a wide variety of guaduales, flora and fauna, and a strip of cloud forest that add charm to the place.
It is 13 km on the road to Medellin, taking a shortcut in the subdivision gate of Las Flores.
